name: Road River Rally
description:
Winnitron Controls

  • Joystick Left & Right To Steer
  • Button 1 Gas
  • Button 2 Brake
  • Reverse Joystick Down + Button 1

Keyboard Controls

Car

  • Left & Right Arrows To Steer
  • Z Gas
  • X Brake
  • Down Arrow + Z To Reverse

Boat

  • J & L Arrows To Steer
  • N Gas
  • M Brake
  • K + Z To Reverse
